name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in enhancing developer productivity and streamlining the software development lifecycle. Expertise in **Python**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **GraphQL**, with a proven track record of leveraging **large language models (LLM)** and **natural language processing (NLP)** techniques, including **prompt engineering** and **fine-tuning**. Skilled in **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **GCP (Google Cloud Platform)** for deploying robust cloud-native applications.

Extensive experience in building real-time and compliant applications within healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring adherence to standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Significant hands-on expertise in creating AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing **embeddings** and **retrieval-augmented generation (RAG)** methodologies. Proficient in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines while maximizing development & deployment efficiency.
